chinese: 目前这个教派已遍布世界各地。

english: Members of congress represents a variety of denominations .
chinese: 国会议员分别属于各种各样的教派。

english: The different denominations are integrated in the pattern of american life .
chinese: 各种不同的教派都融合在美国的生活方式里。

english: Each of the protestant sects is represented and has a plant of its own .
chinese: 新教的每个教派都有它的信徒，而且各有自己的设备。

english: Some of the differences between protestant denominations have to do with ritual .
chinese: 新教各教派之间的一些差异与宗教仪式有关。
教派造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Certain ones such as the episcopalians and the lutherans have a rather formal service .
chinese: 有些教派，如圣公会和路德会，举行比较正式的仪式。

english: He was rejoiced at so early an opportunity of distinguishing his faith in his new sect .
chinese: 他很高兴这么快就能有机会表明他新近才参加的教派的信仰。

english: This i found to be another catechist, but of a different order from the blind man of mull .
chinese: 我发现他也是一位传教士，不过跟姆尔岛的那个瞎子不属于一个教派。

english: The mother of augustine was a huguenot french lady, whose family had emigrate to louisiana during the days of its early settlement .
chinese: 奥古斯丁的母亲是法国雨格诺教派的信徒，其祖上在早期移民的年代就已迁入路易斯安那州。

english: I write distractedly, but this girl-this jeanie deans, is a peevish puritan, superstitious and scrupulous after the manner of her sect .
chinese: 我写得心烦意乱--可是那女郎--那个珍妮迪恩斯是个倔强的清教徒，迷信而且严格地遵守她那教派的规矩。

english: Trappist ? - yeah , they ' re catholic . cistercian
chinese: 苦修派？ -是的，天主教西多教派的

english: Many people adhere to the church of their parents
chinese: 许多人皈依他们父母所属的教派。

english: A pope of a church that will reclaim its property
chinese: 而我的这个教派一直要求恢复

english: - trappist ? - yeah , they ' re catholic . cistercian
chinese: -苦修派？ -是的，天主教西多教派的
